select id,pid,`name`,icon,url,`type`,permission from boot_sys_menu where del_flag = 0
and `type` = #{type} and visible = 0
order by sort desc

select id,pid,`name`,sort,`type`,icon,url,permission,visible from boot_sys_menu where del_flag = 0
and `name` like concat('%',#{qo.name},'%')
order by sort desc

SELECT a.url, a.type, a.sort, a.id, a.pid, a.name, a.icon, a.permission FROM boot_sys_menu a ,boot_sys_role b ,boot_sys_role_menu c ,boot_sys_user_role e WHERE a.id = c.menu_id AND c.role_id = b.id AND b.id = e.role_id AND e.user_id = #{userId} and a.del_flag = 0
and a.type = #{type} and a.visible = 0
group by a.url, a.type, a.sort, a.id, a.pid, a.name, a.icon, a.permission order by a.sort desc
SELECT a.id FROM boot_sys_menu a ,boot_sys_role b ,boot_sys_role_menu c WHERE a.id = c.menu_id AND c.role_id = b.id AND b.id = #{roleId} and a.del_flag = 0 group by a.id

select id,pid,`name` from boot_sys_menu where del_flag = 0 AND `name` NOT LIKE '菜单修改' AND `name` NOT LIKE '菜单新增' AND `name` NOT LIKE '菜单删除' AND `name` not LIKE '租户%' AND `name` not LIKE '套餐%' AND `name` not LIKE '数据源%' AND `name` not LIKE '%同步' AND `name` not like '%搜索%' AND `name` not like '%音频%' AND `name` not like '%视频%' AND `name` not like '%图片%' AND `name` not like '%资源%' AND `name` not like '%流程%' AND `name` not like '%任务%' AND `name` <> '接口文档' order by sort desc
